entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries at times heavy or snow squalls. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy and snow squalls ending in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then northwest 30 gusting to 60 near noon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 30 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 30 in the evening and minus 47 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
